Posts.Content: I have had 9 months off work for chemo and radio for a triple negative breast tumour . I have returned to my job as a nurse In a private nursing home . I have done 2 weeks of reduced hours working alongside a colleague as my phased return . I did agree with GP this would be enough . I Now realise should have had a long phased return . I did one shift alone . I struggled both physically and mentally . Next week I anticipate I will be expected to be in charge for my usual 4 shifts . I dread it . I fear I will not cope . I hate feeling so useless and tired .
Posts.Title: Not coping now back at work .

Posts.Content: Thanks . I've spoken to GP and got a longer period . In fact waiting for manager to call me back . Sadly though she went through the same but does not appear to have had same problems with her fatigue etc and does not understand my predicament . .
Posts.Title: Not coping now back at work .

Posts.Content: Thanks G n J  your quite right in how I'm feeling . i have lost confidence . I do struggle to make decisions . I am telling work I need more time and GP has redone a longer phased return more for me .  Its so good to know others struggled like me and to know I have help and support here  on this site . A BIG thankyou .
